圦字的基本解释

圦
kuɑi
〔圦先〕、
〔圦沢〕分别在岐阜县和福岛县。
日本地名用字。

圦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》苦對切，去隊，溪。］
［《集韻》苦怪切，去怪，溪。］
亦作“凷1”。亦作“圦1”。亦作“墤2”。亦作“1”。“块1”的繁体字。“魁3”的被通假字。“蕢3”的被通假字。
(1)土块。
(2)成疙瘩或成团的东西。
(3)特指郁结的心思。
(4)浑然一体；整体。
(5)安然。参见“塊然”。
(6)孤独；孑然。
(7)量词。用于块状、片状的东西。
(8)量词。货币的单位，相当于“圆”。多用于口语。
(9)方言。附在“这、那、哪”等之后表示地点、处所，相当于“里”。
(10)通“餽”。馈赠。
(11)通“魁”。

圦字的康熙字典解释
圦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
圦字的起名意思

暂无。

圦
Basic explanation of words
圦
kuɑi
〔圦先〕、
〔圦沢〕are in Gifu and Fukushima prefectures.
Japanese place names use words.
圦
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuài］
["Guangyun" cut bitterly, went to the team, Xi. ]
["Jiyun" is bitter and strange, go to blame, Xi. ]
Also known as "凷1". Also known as "圦1". Also known as "墤2". Also known as "1". "Block 1" in traditional characters. "Qui 3" was passed falsely. "蒉3" was passed falsely.
(1) Soil blocks.
(2) Things that are lumps or clumps.
(3) Especially the slumped mind.
(4) One whole; the whole.
(5) Enron. See "Block Ran".
(6) Lonely; lonely.
(7) Quantifiers. Used for lumpy and flaky things.
(8) Quantifiers. The unit of currency is equivalent to "round". Mostly used in spoken language.
(9) Dialects. Attached to "this, that, where", etc., indicate the location and location, which is equivalent to "li".
(10) Through "feed". Gift.
(11) Through "Kui".
